column4: Hi, I have windows xp and ubuntu 9.10. Now I wanna remove, windows and install new ubuntu 10.04. Can I share the same SWAP memory as used for ubuntu 9.10(dont wanna delete 9.10) so that I will have same swap for both versions of ubuntu 10.04 and 9.10
Yes you can share swap partitions between different versions
Oh I see. Thank you DJones, as you said i will use the same swap partition for the newer version.
